title: Clash Error

replies.body:
Thanks for the reports, everyone. Used these to let someone know and the issue has now been resolved.
GLHF in Clash.

thank you for resolving this issue!
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Same here - one of our friends finished placements and still shows as unranked

yeah..... we have the same issue three of us cant be invited or create a team for the same reason....... at this point i feel like it was a scam to get more people to do their placements. (not saying it is, just feels so to me)
Same issue here my friend finished his placements a few days ago, he even played 4 extra games and it still considers him illegible
